name: SMUTA: Inception
description:
SMUTA: Inception is a classic base defense. Protect the base and earn money. Hordes of enemies will try to break through the defenses. Give them a hard fight. Protect the approaches to your base, withstand several attacks using 10 types of cool weapons with the possibility of their improvements.

Cybernetic zombies become stronger with each level and there are more and more of them. Think over tactics to beat off all waves of enemies. sometimes it is better to sell a tower and replace it with a more powerful one, or improve an existing one.

features:
-10 types of towers
-9 types of enemies
-10 blood
